name: TIRTIR Mask Fit Red Cushion Foundation | Full coverage, Weighless, Skin fit, Satin Glow Finish, Korean cushion foundation (#15C Fair Porcelain, 0.63 Fl Oz (Pack of 1))
about_this_item: [1st KOREAN CUSHION FOUNDATION with 40 SHADE RANGE] TIRTIR Mask Fit Red Cushion is the first Korean cushion foundation with a wide range of shades. From light to deep tones, TIRTIR cushion foundation Korea product provides strong, comfortable coverage filled with nutrients for a flawless, all-day wear. Achieve the perfect "glass skin" look with this innovative Korean makeup solution.

[SKIN-FIT COVERAGE with SATIN GLOW] This Korean foundation makeup offers medium to full coverage that feels weightless on the skin. With high, breathable coverage and a satin glow finish, it ensures a naturally beautiful and radiant look. Experience the ultimate in Korean makeup cushion foundation performance with a flawless finish that lasts all day.

[72 HOUR LONG-LASTING & WEIGHLESS] Experience the foundation makeup that feels super thin like water with a lightweight, non-greasy formula. The TIRTIR cushion‚Äôs 72-hour lasting power ensures enduring wear, proving that a little goes a long way. Perfect for K-beauty enthusiasts looking for a reliable base TIRTIR.

[NOURISHING ELASTICITY] Infused with hibiscus and red propolis extracts, our formula enhances skin elasticity, providing a lasting finish that radiates a satin glow. Enjoy makeup that not only lasts but also highlights your glass skin beauty all day long.

[EASY, QUICK APPICATION] Goes on easily and sets quickly, providing a smooth, flawless finish. It can be applied lightly for a natural look, embodying the best in Korean cushion innovation for ease and efficiency in your daily makeup routine.

title: THE BEST!!!!!
content: OMG! I cannot believe how amazing this foundation is! I tried the pink one as well by Tir Tir. Please do not listen to the bad comments, run and buy it and test it yourself! I honestly did not order this sooner because of the bad reviews but decided to give it a try. I have tried from the most expensive foundations and nothing compares to this one! I had people stop me and ask me what I was wearing. It‚Äôs been a few years that I have not liked the way my foundation looks like, as you age, everything settles into your fine lines. I love the fact that it‚Äôs all in one simple compact and easy to travel with. I no longer need a brush nor a beauty blender. Also, this foundation does not need primer nor setting spray! All you need is to apply powder to set the foundation. My skin looks flawless, like I have no makeup, full coverage but not cakey, it‚Äôs super thin like water and covers every little spot. I feel I have a filter. For reference I use the Origins nights ins as a moisturizer and then apply the Tir Tir followed by Chanel powder. My face looks amazing and I will forever wear this, I hope they never discontinue this. I also go the pink one, it is more matte but settles the same, the red one gives it a matte radiance finish while the pink is matte with no radiance but settle exactly the same.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I love this product, but I would recommend buying it off of a different site. I was sent the wrong shade twice and one that was used. They won't give me refunds unless I do the leg work to bring it 20 miles to UPS to return it !!! Trying to order this has been a nightmare and Amazon customer service has been terrible . Being a prime member is just not worth it anymore . Amazon used to be great about making things right that they messed up, but now they just push it all on the customer - what a joke !!!!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2024

title: The product is great - but Amazon isn't !!!
content: I like the packaging. The coverage is full upon first application. No need for 2 layers. A little bit goes a long way. Wore nicely under powder and only my T zone became oily after hours of wear (I have oily skin). I am very pleasantly surprised at this foundation's performance. I think it will work for all types of skin. The shade range for richer complexions is not the greatest, though.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Female in her mid 20s here and let me tell you how much I love this foundation. I saw the hype on tik Tok and decided to try a sample of this stuff just to find my shade. I ended up buying the full product and I was so surprised by just how good it is. I naturally have oily skin around my nose and forehead area while the rest of my face is a bit dry so finding a foundation that can tackle both of those issues is difficult. I also have acne (just PCOS things) and hyperpigmentation which is worth mentioning because this stuff covers almost all of it! Before my routine would be me applying concealer over my acne and then go over it with foundation, but I don't need to do that anymore. This foundation manages to cover the the majority, all while still feeling lightweight on my face. Not to mention that I use a small amount of this product.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2024

title: Surprisingly good

title: Verified Purchase

There is no 21N or 22N either. I can sometimes wear cool olive tones too, but they don't have anything olive either. title: Great product
content: There‚Äôs a bit of a learning curve, you have to be very lighthanded with the cushion, and it‚Äôs a must to press out any excess onto the plastic inner cover before applying to your face. You should barely see any product on the cushion when you apply it. Also, swiping will not work, you have to really tap it into your skin. Watch some youtube tutorials and once you learn how to apply it, it‚Äôs a beautiful finish that lasts and it feels like nothing on the skin. I do recommend wearing sunscreen underneath, the amount of foundation for light coverage is unlikely to be enough to provide sun protection even if it is SPF 50.
